name: Hotel Tycoon Classic
description:
Hotel Tycoon Classic is a tribute to the old tycoon games. 
You must manage your Hotels and unlock all nine achievements.

It is my first game, so please don't judge it too much^^


Some Features:

- unlock achievements

- buy and manage hotels

- upgrade your hotels

Note:

There is a bug! New version at 20:40 PM

More features will come in the future, if you have some ideas join my discord server https://discord.gg/vRf9T4
